name: Point of attraction
description:
This game was made during the 48 secret jam - September 2017, made with the ska engine.

Rules :

  • You're an '_' (underscore)
  • You have 2 minutes to accumulate score.
  • You have to destroy evil terminal commands, 1 point is gained by enemy.
  • Your ammo are the 0 and 1 characters.
  • If you're hit, you'll have -10 seconds on your countdown.
  • If you survive to 40 seconds remaining, a surprise will appear :)
